content: We would  like to thank Blaze in particular for giving a wealth of information on the various tiles, assisting us in selecting appropriate tiles, and assuring fast delivery.
We were quite pleased with the high level of service provided by Blaze International and would definitely recommend them.
We found Blaze International to be of the finest quality in every part of our business with them. They recently presented us with a large selection of tiles for our new construction.

I just wanted to express my gratitude for your assistance with the qrax wall tiles that I purchased. Despite the fact that it was a modest order, you were all quite helpful. When I redo my kitchen and bathroom, I will surely return!
Everything worked out perfectly. Thank you for your quick response. I will gladly suggest you.
